there you see your applications menu....if you rightclick now you have the opion to create a launcher or folder in the menu
apps normally install their executables in /usr/bin if you installed a package that hasnt created a launcher, look in synaptic in the poackage deatiuls
you could go too....but i would use synaptic....for the start and look at the specific package you want a launcher for.....
